backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister containing an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented Valentine-related features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing major Valentine UI components and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining Valentine color tokens, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React page orchestrating the Valentine experience including intro overlay, hero content, animations, and surprise reveal.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Floati: Generates animated floating hearts with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/valentine/RosePe: Creates animated falling rose petals or static petals when reduced‑motion is enabled.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Rotati: Cycles through playful one‑liners with pause‑on‑hover and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Surpri: Interactive gift button that reveals a Valentine coupon book with animated transitions.
frontend/src/components/valentine/useInt: Custom hook managing ambient and confirmation audio playback with mute state and user interaction unlocking.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Intro overlay component with ambient audio, mute control, and an evasive 'No' button that moves away from the pointer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus Valentine-themed color variables and custom component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, shadows, and Valentine-specific theme values with plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the current Valentine’s website project state, listing implemented features, requirements, and metadata. Includes introductory screen addition and flags indicating the file represents a fix request and project version info.
